summary.span: 为应用程序或组件配置角色。

span.span: Configures a role for an application or component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用将角色添加到应用程序，并将它们与组件关联。You can use the to add roles to an application, and to associate them with components. 当应用于整个程序集，它确保该角色存在在应用程序配置 （COM + 目录）。When is applied to an assembly as a whole, it ensures that the role exists in the application configuration (COM+ catalog). 你可以添加使用 COM + 资源管理器角色的成员。You can add members of the role using the COM+ Explorer. 当应用于一个组件，可确保该角色在应用程序配置中，存在，且将目标组件与角色相关联。When applied to a component, the ensures that the role exists in the application configuration, and associates the target component with the role. 默认情况下，创建的角色具有任何成员。By default, created roles have no members. 如果属性设置为`true`，每个人用户组自动添加到角色。If the property is set to `true`, the Everyone user group is automatically added to the role. 这是最适合于提供最小控制系统的所有访问类型角色。This is best for all-access type roles that are given minimal control over the system. 可以在组件级别，每个接口和每个方法指定的安全角色。Security roles can be specified at the component level, per interface and per method. 与其他方法属性、 安全配置当前不在接口定义和实现的方法之间共享。As with other method attributes, security configuration is not currently shared between interface definition and method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此特性将角色与包含程序集相关联的类。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to associate a role with an assembly that contains classes.
